mapper.select:
select
from clean_production_company where regist_item_id=#{registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1

select
from clean_production_company where company_name like concat(concat('%',#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
